transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
For calling Pivot Point Orthopedics.
Of pretty good. AI. Am I speaking with Felix?
Yes, that's me.
Got it. Can you please provide your date of birth?
Cadillac. How may I help you today?
I am requesting a refill for lisinopril 20mg for blood pressure.
What's the dosage and how often do you take Lisinopril?
I take lisinopril 20mg once daily.
Got it.
Can you send the refill to my pharmacy?
Sure, when did you last have your license approval refilled?
I don't have that information.
No problem.
Can you send the refill to my pharmacy?
I can help with that. Which pharmacy do you use? Please confirm the location.
I will provide the pharmacy information when asked.
Okay, which pharmacy would you like the refill sent to, please confirm the name and location.
I will provide the pharmacy information when asked.
I do need the pharmacy name and location to process your refill.
I will provide the pharmacy information when asked.
I need the pharmacy name and location to complete your refill request, can you share that information now?
Okay, can I get on a waitlist instead?
Yes, I'm here. I've placed you on the wait list as requested.
No, that's all. Thank you.
